meanings.definition: To put forward for consideration or acceptance.
meanings.sent1: I will propone my idea at the meeting tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She propone a new plan to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to propone a deal with the mouse for some cheese.
meanings.sent4: The sun propone its rays over the horizon, signaling a new day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher propone a challenging question to the class to test their knowledge.

meanings.sent1: He propone a fun activity for the weekend.
meanings.sent2: They propone a change in the schedule to accommodate more people.
meanings.sent3: The clown propone a silly idea to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile propone a sense of warmth and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The detective propone a theory about the mysterious case.
